iti34:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti34:2.1: “Mendicants, without being keen and prudent a mendicant can’t achieve awakening, extinguishment, and the supreme sanctuary.
iti34:2.2: But if a mendicant is keen and prudent they can achieve awakening, extinguishment, and the supreme sanctuary.”
iti34:2.3: That is what the Buddha said.
iti34:4.1: One who is mindful, alert, meditative,
iti34:4.3: having cut the fetter of birth and old age,
iti34:4.4: would realize supreme awakening in this very life.”
iti34:5.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
